thread.section_title: Venetoinside.com Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Venetoinside.com | www.venetoinside.com
thread.title: jean Pooley
thread.title_full: Venetoinside.com recensione scritta da jean Pooley

author: jean Pooley
title: jean Pooley
text:
We had spent over an hour trying to book 7 days of Vaporetto tickets for our week in Venice, Not on this site but another nameless one. We couldn't understand what to do; what to press and trying to pay when we finally tried to buy tickets led into deep water.
Trying to book one last time led to Venetoinside.com which is simple to navigate; quick to use;allowed payment by simple means of a credit card and produced the goods immediately.
How we wish we had found it an hour earlier. We'll use it again.
